name: Gladstone Brookes
overview:
Gladstone Brookes is a PPI claims company based in Warrington. They help consumers reclaim mis-sold Payment Protection Insurance which are often sold alongside a loan, credit card or mortgage.

The mis-selling of Payment Protection Insurance has been widespread across many of the high street banks, lenders and credit card companies in the UK.

With an estimated 2.5m people entitled to reclaim back their mis-sold PPI, there is still around Â£5bn yet to be claimed.
